dbDAO

Class CouponDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbDAO.CouponDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO, java.io.Serializable

    public class CouponDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO, java.io.Serializable
    this class dbDAO is the class that works with the Data Base in all issues creation and removing updating and so of the coupons options following the methods. all the methods in this class using SqlQueries class for the SQL queries. the members sqlId and campId with getter and setter to help methods having the right ID when sending a quarry to DB.
    Author:
    user

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void creatCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      creatCoupon method is sending a checking quarry to the DB using Creatorclass if the title is available in case of true response it will send an DuplicateException message that the coupon is exist if the result is false it will put the coupon in DB again using Creatorclass startDate and endDate getting date values from the coupon that obtained in the method startDateString and endDateString converting the date to string so the DB get it right.
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCoupon()
      this method is returning a coupons ArrayList from DB.

      this getter reveals the company id according the company id in DB that informed in compID member.

      this method is extract the coupons ArrayList with the same type as request.
      Coupon getCouponeById(long id)
      this method is returning a coupon instance back from DB by adjustment the received id in the signature of the method to the coupons id column in the DB using CoupListclass

      this getter is made for receiving the coupon id that informed in this class

      • creatCoupon

        public void creatCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.sql.SQLException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        DuplicateException
        creatCoupon method is sending a checking quarry to the DB using Creatorclass if the title is available in case of true response it will send an DuplicateException message that the coupon is exist if the result is false it will put the coupon in DB again using Creatorclass startDate and endDate getting date values from the coupon that obtained in the method startDateString and endDateString converting the date to string so the DB get it right. then sqlId is updated from the DB by PreparedStatement executeUpdate from Creatorclass than tie Coupon to Company by adding a new Company_Coupon line to Company_Coupon table in DB using the ID from sqlID and CompID that updated earlier by the CompanyFacade using Creatorclass
        Specified by:
        creatCoupon in interface CouponDAO
        Throws:
        DuplicateException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                         java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException,
                         NotAvailableException
        removeCoupon method is designed to remove coupon either by company or by the DailyCouponExpirationTask from all the tables in DB Coupon ,Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon. SqlExecuteclass first send a quarry to check if the coupon is exist in DB and if the result false it will send an Exception message that the coupon is not exist. in case the result is true SqlExecuteclass get the coupon id from DB so it can work with. then it send quarries to delete the coupon records from all tables that first recall. than it send message that the coupon is removed successfully.
        Specified by:
        removeCoupon in interface CouponDAO
        Throws:
        DuplicateException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        NotAvailableException

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                         java.sql.SQLException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        The method updateCoupon using UpdaterDBDAOclass to updating end date and price. the update method in UpdaterDBDAOclass is receiving a String and send it as a query to the DB. the String updatingCoupon using values from the coupon instance that received in the method signature.
        Specified by:
        updateCoupon in interface CouponDAO
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByCompanyID()
                                                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                            java.sql.SQLException,
                                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is returning an ArrayList of coupon instance type from DB. unlike the previews method it will return the coupons that owned to the specific company that call the method. the CoupListclass do all the work with the DB.

      • getCouponByType

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
                                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                   java.sql.SQLException,
                                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        this method is extract the coupons ArrayList with the same type as request. it will also adjust the company id to received the coupons of the requesting company. the type is a CouponType enumClass type that defines the category of the coupon. CoupListclass do all the logic work with the DB by receiving a string quarry and returning an ArrayList.
